Vehicle.title: Vehicle
Vehicle.description: Represents a vehicle available for booking in the transportation company's fleet.

id.description: Unique identifier for the vehicle, typically a slug.

name.description: The model name of the vehicle (e.g., LiXiang L7).

imageUrls.description: URLs of the vehicle's images. The first image is the primary one.

featureKeys.description: A list of i18n keys for features offered by the vehicle.

price.description: The base price per day for the vehicle, in USD. If 0 or omitted, the price is considered negotiable.

capacity.description: The maximum passenger capacity of the vehicle.

UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's public profile and roles.

uid.description: The user's unique ID, matching their Firebase Auth UID.

isAdmin.description: Whether the user has administrative privileges.

definition.description: Stores vehicle information. Writable only by admins.

params.name: vehicleId
params.description: The unique identifier of the vehicle.

definition.description: Stores user profile information and roles. The document ID must match the user's auth UID.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user.
